Text: eAssistKen I would like to like to schedule a meeting with you to discuss your corporate customer service initiatives eAssist is the most highly sought after customer service solution within the Global arena eAssists value proposition will provide you and your executive team the ability to consistently increase revenues decrease operational costs improve customer service and increase shareholder value I look forward to hearing back from you as to your availability Regards Thomas A Chuckel Vice President eAssist Global Solutions cell Wateridge Vista Dr San Diego CA
